nodes.bodyText: Minor: mixture of tabs and spaces makes this code for the following method format awkwardly
minor: System.out with initials accidentally left in test code?

beforeCommit.message: Hide url and connProps when using generic props

afterCommit.message: Hide url and connProps when using generic props

nodes.bodyText: Changed URL to password and added connectionProperties as an internal element inside generic properties so that if someone is using generic properties to connect to oracle these passwords are still sufficiently hidden.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -110,9 +110,11 @@
   <AD id="databaseName"         required="false" type="String"  name="%databaseName" description="%databaseName.desc"/>
   <AD id="serverName"           required="false" type="String"  name="%serverName" description="%serverName.desc"/>
   <AD id="portNumber"           required="false" type="Integer" name="%portNumber" description="%portNumber.desc"/>
-  <AD id="URL"                  required="false" type="String"  name="%URL" description="%URL.desc"/>
+  <AD id="URL"                  required="false" type="String"  ibm:type="password" name="%URL" description="%URL.desc"/>
   <AD id="user"                 required="false" type="String"  name="%user" description="%user.desc"/>
   <AD id="password"             required="false" type="String"  ibm:type="password" name="%password" description="%password.desc"/>
+  <!-- If using generic properties and user provides oracle connectionProperties then make sure it is not traced as it could container passwords -->
+  <AD id="connectionProperties" required="false" type="String"  ibm:type="password" name="internal" description="internal use only"/>
